mapper.select: SELECT U.U_ID ,T.T_ID ,FN_CODE_NAME(PI.PAY_STATE) AS CODE_NAME ,PI.P_ID ,T.NOW_TICKET_CNT ,T.TICKET_CNT ,EXPIRATION_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(PI.CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DATE ,IF((SELECT C_PRICE_TYPE FROM CLASS_PRICE C WHERE C.C_P_ID = T.C_P_ID) ='C060100','Uspec Oneday Pass','Uspec Special Pass') AS CLASS_TYPE_NAME ,(SELECT C_PRICE_TYPE FROM CLASS_PRICE C WHERE C.C_P_ID = T.C_P_ID) AS CLASS_TYPE FROM USER_INFO U INNER JOIN TICKET_INFO T ON T.U_ID=U.U_ID INNER JOIN PAY_INFO PI ON PI.T_ID=T.T_ID WHERE U.U_ID=#{ uId } ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO U RIGHT JOIN TICKET_INFO T ON T.U_ID=U.U_ID LEFT JOIN PAY_INFO PI ON PI.T_ID=T.T_ID
WHERE U.U_ID=#{ uId }
